description: This modern and minimalist-style restaurant with three small dining rooms full of character provides the backdrop for contemporary-style cuisine which is constantly evolving. The menu includes a few snack options for those in a hurry or looking to sample a variety of dishes in smaller portions. Open at lunchtime by prior reservation.
